text:
As many as 11 persons, including a child, were admitted to the Government Hospital in Tiruchengode after drinking contaminated water on Wednesday. They complained of vomiting and giddiness.

Over 1,000 families reside at Indira Nagar in Padharai in Tiruchengode taluk. Water was supplied to them from an overhead tank in the area. A total of 45 residents who drank the water reported ill and 11 persons complained of vomiting. Collector V. Dakshinamoorthy visited them at the hospital. A medical team was camping in the residential area and screening the people. Water samples were also taken.
title: 11 hospitalised
